name: Sergeant Seymour, Robot Cop: Time Flies
name_original: Sergeant Seymour, Robot Cop: Time Flies
description:
Captain Callie, Cyborg Commander has a new mission for you.  The bandits have released a swarm of robotic flies into the distorted space-time continuum.  It's up to you, Sergeant Seymour, Robot Cop, to stop them.

game, audio, & art by Michael.
